=Current releases=

== v0.6.0 ==

Release date: October 3 2012

Some of the most important new features are:

 * [http://code.google.com/p/soi-toolkit/issues/detail?id=243 Issue #243, Add support for Mule 3.3]
 * [http://code.google.com/p/soi-toolkit/issues/detail?id=244 Issue #244, Add support for Mule Studio 1.3.1]
 * [http://code.google.com/p/soi-toolkit/issues/detail?id=242 Issue #242, Add support for XA transactions]
 * [http://code.google.com/p/soi-toolkit/issues/detail?id=192 Issue #192, Replace soi-toolkit jaxb transformers with standrad Mule equivalents]

For details se [ReleaseNotes#soi-toolkit_v0.6.0 Release Notes].

=Planned releases=

== v0.7.0 ==

*Planned release date:* Second half 2013.

*Planned features:*

 * Support for Mule ESB 3.4
 * Support for Mule Studio 3.4, including:
  * Mule Studio Maven support
  * Mule Studio Flow Debugger
  * Mule Studio Data Mapper (for Mule ESB EE customers)
 * Support for robust one-way services with JMS based retry handling and guaranteed delivery + logging and archiving and more
 * Custom templates for the soi-toolkit generators
